summary: FlaxT5Module encapsulates a T5 encoder‑decoder architecture as a Flax neural‑network module, handling initialization of encoder and decoder sub‑modules and providing a callable forward pass that processes inputs through the full model.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑use, configurable T5 model component for natural‑language processing applications such as translation, summarization, and text generation within the Flax/JAX ecosystem.
